RaulTiru (2020-12-08): Research to Top Plastic Pollution Solutions [People, Tech, Organizations, Governments]

Hi all! I hope You're having a great day. I'm doing research on how Consumers, Organizations, and Governments are fighting the Plastic Pollution problem. I would love to get your feedback, nothing is too crazy.

Up until now, we have 6 tech solution segments, 5 consumer solution segments and we're kinda struggling with how Governments are stepping up, other than banning single-use plastics like bags and straws.

Thank you so much! Here is our list of Plastic Pollution Solutions.
summary:
The post acknowledges the efforts of consumers, organizations, and governments in combating plastic pollution, particularly in terms of tech and consumer solutions. However, it expresses a struggle in identifying the actions of governments beyond the ban on single-use plastics like bags and straws. The sentiment seems to be open-minded and positive, seeking input and ideas to address the plastic pollution issue comprehensively.
